r.s: Provides a wrapper to the ImageMagick library.
r.d:
Imagick is a native php extension to create and modify images using the ImageMagick API. This extension requires ImageMagick version 6.2.4+ and PHP 5.1.3+.
IMPORTANT: Version 2.x API is not compatible with earlier versions.
r.n: - Added set/getColorspace - Added transformImageColorspace (Patrick Durold) - Fix writeImage logic error in filename_len checking. - Fix conversion to double in affine matrices - s,function_entry,zend_function_entry, (Johannes)
